---
title: '纸片'
---

# 纸片

低级基础组件, 宽高属性的值不需要写单位

### 参数

#### width
- 类型： `number`
- 默认值： `0`

#### height
- 类型： `number`
- 默认值： `0`

#### color
- 类型: `string`
- 默认值: `transparent`

``` html
<a-sheet class="d-flex justify-center align-center fs-24" color="blue" height="80">hello h5activity</a-sheet>
```

<a-sheet class="d-flex justify-center align-center fs-24" color="blue" height="80">hello h5activity</a-sheet>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import '../plugin/h5activity.scss';
</style>
